title: Modify fo-experience.tsx for batch generation
description:
Update app/fo-02/components/fo-experience.tsx for iterative batch generation:

State changes:
- currentBatch: string[] (current 10 affirmations)
- currentBatchIndex: number (0, 1, or 2)
- isGenerating: boolean
- generationError: string | null

Flow changes:
- Generate batch 1 when entering Step 5 (after Step 4 Start click)
- Generate batch 2 when clicking Continue on Step 6
- Generate batch 3 when clicking 'Yes, please' on Step 6.2
- Show GenerationLoading component during each generation
- Handle generation errors with retry option

Call generateAffirmationBatchFO02 with accumulated approved/skipped lists.
acceptance_criteria: Experience handles 3-batch flow with loading states between each
